mapper.insert: insert into user (email, pw, name, tel, addr1,addr2,addr3,addr4,addr5,addr6, ispro) values (#{email},#{pw},#{name},#{tel},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{addr3},#{addr4},#{addr5},#{addr6},#{ispro})
mapper.update: update user set email = #{email}, pw = #{pw}, name =#{name}, tel = #{tel}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, addr3 = #{addr3}, addr4 = #{addr4}, addr5 = #{addr5}, addr6 = #{addr6}, ispro =#{ispro} where userno = #{userno}
